name: City Truck Racer
description:
The city is the best place to have trucks racing each other. Wide roads allow for great speed along the highway. Tighten your seatbelts and take your Truck into the streets of city. In this racing game you take control of a big rig. This big rig is not a normal truck this one is very fast so you can race with it. it’s time to show your big truck and win every race in wide beautiful City. it’s all about speed so it’s not a normal truck simulator. Our challenge is to make perfect race with other furious cars and vehicles. Drive high performance heavy duty road trailer on your mobile devices or ios tablets. Enjoy realistic drive with artificial intelligence traffic on streets. Easy to control and fun to play steer, sprint and drag huge vehicle in 3D sim like never before.

Game Features:

- Speed, racing and power in one game
- Become the best Big truck racer
- Realistic Truck driving
- Show of your amazing racing skills
- Avoid to hit the traffic and buildings
- Stunning HD Graphics
